main event: A bright white light was observed approaching a car traveling northward on the Northeast Extension of the Pennsylvania Turnpike near Plymouth Meeting, Pennsylvania.
interesting points: The light appeared to be hovering or stationary at first, then moved rapidly across the sky in a horizontal direction.
The light was estimated to be about the size of a basketball at arm's length and about 1000 feet above the ground.
The observation was made by the driver and nine other passengers in the automobile.
No further investigation was considered necessary by Project Blue Book due to a prior telephone report.
The object's color changed from a glowing yellowish white to a blue-green over the course of the observation period.
witnesses: the driver and nine other passengers in the automobile
